scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev --workspace=billing-dashboard-demo -- --port 3001" "npm run dev --workspace='Mawacon Connect' -- --port 3002" "npm run dev:root"
scripts.build: npm run build --workspace=billing-dashboard-demo && npm run build --workspace='Mawacon Connect' && next build
scripts.install:all: npm install && npm install --workspace=billing-dashboard-demo && npm install --workspace='Mawacon Connect'
